name: PowerISO-EX
short_description:
having used windows 8.1 with the mount feature once i got back on windows 7 using the right click menu to mount ISO's got annoying... so i created this app to mimic that windows 8.1 feature.

using this will allow you to mount ISO images via PowerISO Virtual Disk Drive just by double clicking the *.iso file.

**as of now it reuses the 1st vDrive that it finds.. but will add support for adding a new vDrive for each iso. with the option to change default behavior**

To Install

1. Install PowerISO-Ex... 

2. Next right click any ISO file then click Properties... 

3. Next to "Opens With" click the Change button then double click "Mount Via PowerISO"

4. click Apply then OK & your done!
